title: Mouse Problems
body:
I am not sure whats really wrong, but my mouse doesn't feel responsive or something when I play.

I have trouble clicking where i want to and it just feels laggy I am not even sure how to describe it, tried it with two different mice? today and both felt the same way.

Any else have this problem?

replies.body:
You might want to play around with your PC's mouse settings to see if adjusting the cursor speed would feel better being slower or faster! If you think this is something that is somehow related to only League, you can always try doing a quick config reset to see if that helps.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
This did not help. Do you think that its something else? I tried to mouses, its hard to explain what happens but it just feels awful, its super hard to click wherre i wanna click
It might not even be my mouse, when i move my screen it doesnt feel smooth at all. I have no idea whats going on but its awful
